actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the Secretary of Transportation to reimburse the Commodity Credit Corporation for certain shipping costs relating to food assistance to Poland.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to reimburse the Commodity Credit Corporation for ocean freight charges related to the export of food assistance to Poland to the extent they are higher because of the requirement that agricultural commodities be transported on U.S.-flag vessels.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the Secretary of Transportation to reimburse the Commodity Credit Corporation for certain shipping costs relating to food assistance to Poland.
